name: Beyond Aviation
about: Beyond Aviation, founded in 2021, is Southern New Jersey's leading aviation school, based at the South Jersey Regional airport in Lumberton, NJ. Our faculty includes experienced military, airline, and general aviation pilots, bringing decades of flying expertise to our training programs. We offer comprehensive pilot training, fostering a community of dedicated and skilled aviators. With a commitment to safety, excellence, and personalized instruction, Beyond Aviation is the ideal choice for aspiring pilots seeking a rigorous and supportive learning environment. We are dedicated to helping our students achieve their aviation goals.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
